thread.title: Breakup songs: 'Brexit Big Band' soundtracks Britan's EU divorce

title: Breakup songs: 'Brexit Big Band' soundtracks Britan's EU divorce
text:
Breakup songs: 'Brexit Big Band' soundtracks Britan's EU divorce 1:03pm EST - 01:28 
Composer Matthew Herbert hopes the musical project will bring people together in the wake of Britain's decision to leave the bloc. Saskia O'Donoghue reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Composer Matthew Herbert hopes the musical project will bring people together in the wake of Britain's decision to leave the bloc. Saskia O'Donoghue reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2nx5ZOA
